name: #HonestToFrigMarketing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Bite-size, actionable marketing ideas that'll help you navigate and leverage social media & digital marketing that matters to your business. We go beyond fluff and vanity, and help you learn how to effectively navigate and leverage digital marketing in ways that matter. From marketing campaign planning, to tracking and analytics, learn the tools and resources that can save you time and money.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
